title: Practitioner Economics Workshop for Advanced Monetary Policy

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Enhancing practical monetary policy analysis competencies for corporate managers and leaders through job-focused training

learning_goals: Teams can create and defend monetary policy scenarios using real economic indicators.
Learners can simulate the monetary policy decision-making process and apply at least three policy tools (interest rates, reserve requirement ratios, open market operations).
Through writing economic status reports and peer reviews, learners can achieve at least 80% validity in policy proposals.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
